setup_script_description: opens the menu, and sets focus on 'Action 4'
task: navigate to first item in menu
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Action 4' menu item, navigate to the first menu item.
output_assertions: Role of the focused item, 'menu item', is conveyed
Name of the focused item, 'Action 1', is conveyed
Position of the focused item in the menu (1) is conveyed
Number of items in the menu (4) is conveyed
